entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming northeast 20 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023
